52 /***********************************************************
53  *
54  * This file contains the functions which construct a
55  * cylindrical WC detector. It used by both the SK and
56  * LBNE WC detector modes. It is called in the Construct()
57  * method in WCSimDetectorConstruction.cc.
58  *
59  * Sourcefile for the WCSimDetectorConstruction class
60  *
61  ***********************************************************/
62

80 G4LogicalVolume* WCSimDetectorConstruction::ConstructCylinder()
81 {
82  G4cout << "**** Building Cylindrical Detector ****" << G4endl;
83 
84  //-----------------------------------------------------
85  // Positions
86  //-----------------------------------------------------
87 
88  debugMode = false;
89 
90  WCPosition=0.;//Set the WC tube offset to zero
91 
92  WCIDRadius = WCIDDiameter/2.;
93  // the number of regular cell in phi direction:
94  WCBarrelRingNPhi = WCBarrelNumPMTHorizontal/WCPMTperCellHorizontal;
95  // the part of one ring, that is covered by the regular cells:
96  totalAngle = 2.0*pi*rad*WCBarrelRingNPhi*WCPMTperCellHorizontal/WCBarrelNumPMTHorizontal;
97  // angle per regular cell:
98  dPhi = totalAngle/ WCBarrelRingNPhi;
99 
100  if(rotateBarrelHalfTower)
101  barrelPhiOffset = -dPhi/2; // For WCTE, the barrel is rotated by half a tower for correct alignment with endcaps
102  else
103  barrelPhiOffset = 0.;
104 
105  // it's height:
106  barrelCellHeight = (WCIDHeight-2.*WCBarrelPMTOffset)/WCBarrelNRings;
107  // the height of all regular cells together:
108  mainAnnulusHeight = WCIDHeight -2.*WCBarrelPMTOffset -2.*barrelCellHeight;
109 
110  //TF: has to change for mPMT vessel:
111 
112  G4cout << WCIDRadius << ", " << WCPMTExposeHeight << ", " << mPMT_vessel_cyl_height << ", " << mPMT_vessel_radius << G4endl;
113 #ifdef DEBUG
114  G4cout << "HYBRID = " << hybrid << G4endl;
115 #endif
116 
117  if(hybrid){
118  if(mPMT_vessel_cyl_height + mPMT_vessel_radius < 1.*mm)
119  innerAnnulusRadius = WCIDRadius - std::max(WCPMTExposeHeight,WCPMTExposeHeight2)-1.*mm;
120  else
121  innerAnnulusRadius = WCIDRadius - std::max(WCPMTExposeHeight,(mPMT_vessel_cyl_height + mPMT_vessel_radius)) -1.*mm;
122  }
123  else{
124  if(mPMT_vessel_cyl_height + mPMT_vessel_radius < 1.*mm)
125  innerAnnulusRadius = WCIDRadius - WCPMTExposeHeight -1.*mm;
126  else
127  innerAnnulusRadius = WCIDRadius - (mPMT_vessel_cyl_height + mPMT_vessel_radius) -1.*mm;
128  }
129 
130  //TF: need to add a Polyhedra on the other side of the outerAnnulusRadius for the OD
131  outerAnnulusRadius = WCIDRadius + WCBlackSheetThickness + 1.*mm;//+ Stealstructure etc.
132  WCODRadius = WCIDRadius + WCBlackSheetThickness;
133  if(isODConstructed){
134  const G4double sphereRadius =
135  (WCPMTODExposeHeight*WCPMTODExposeHeight+ WCPMTODRadius*WCPMTODRadius)/(2*WCPMTODExposeHeight);
136  WCODRadius =
137  WCIDRadius + WCBlackSheetThickness + WCODDeadSpace + // ID Structure
138  WCODTyvekSheetThickness; // Tyvek attached to structure
139  outerAnnulusRadius = WCODRadius + sphereRadius;
140  }
141 #ifdef WCSIMCONSTRUCTCYLINDER_VERBOSE
142  G4cout
143  << "GEOMCHECK3 WCIDRadius \t" << WCIDRadius << G4endl
144  << "GEOMCHECK3 WCBlackSheetThickness \t" << WCBlackSheetThickness << G4endl
145  << "GEOMCHECK3 WCODDeadSpace \t" << WCODDeadSpace << G4endl
146  << "GEOMCHECK3 WCODTyvekSheetThickness \t" << WCODTyvekSheetThickness << G4endl
147  << "GEOMCHECK3 sphereRadius \t" << outerAnnulusRadius - WCODRadius << G4endl
148  << "GEOMCHECK3 WCPMTODExposeHeight \t" << WCPMTODExposeHeight << G4endl
149  << "GEOMCHECK3 WCPMTODExposeHeight \t" << WCPMTODExposeHeight << G4endl
150  << "GEOMCHECK3 WCPMTODRadius \t" << WCPMTODRadius << G4endl
151  << "GEOMCHECK3 WCPMTODRadius \t" << WCPMTODRadius << G4endl
152  << "GEOMCHECK3 WCPMTODExposeHeight \t" << WCPMTODExposeHeight << G4endl
153  ;
154 #endif
155 
156  // the radii are measured to the center of the surfaces
157  // (tangent distance). Thus distances between the corner and the center are bigger.
158  //BQ: Updated with new HK OD size (2020/12/06). Simply assume no tyvek thickness or dead space.
159  WCLength = WCIDHeight + 2*(WCODHeightWaterDepth + WCBlackSheetThickness + WCODDeadSpace + WCODTyvekSheetThickness + 1*mm);
160  WCRadius = (outerAnnulusRadius + WCODLateralWaterDepth)/cos(dPhi/2.) ;
161 #ifdef WCSIMCONSTRUCTCYLINDER_VERBOSE
162  G4cout
163  << "GEOMCHECK2 WCLength \t" << WCLength << G4endl
164  << "GEOMCHECK2 WCIDHeight \t" << WCIDHeight << G4endl
165  << "GEOMCHECK2 WCODHeightWaterDepth \t" << WCODHeightWaterDepth << G4endl
166  << "GEOMCHECK2 WCBlackSheetThickness \t" << WCBlackSheetThickness << G4endl
167  << "GEOMCHECK2 WCODDeadSpace \t" << WCODDeadSpace << G4endl
168  << "GEOMCHECK2 WCODTyvekSheetThickness \t" << WCODTyvekSheetThickness << G4endl
169  << "GEOMCHECK2 WCRadius \t" << WCRadius << G4endl
170  << "GEOMCHECK2 outerAnnulusRadius \t" << outerAnnulusRadius << G4endl
171  << "GEOMCHECK2 WCODLateralWaterDepth \t" << WCODLateralWaterDepth << G4endl
172  ;
173 #endif
174  //WCLength = WCIDHeight + (WCODHeight+WCOuterStructure)*2; //jl145 - reflects top veto blueprint, cf. Farshid Feyzi
175  //WCRadius = (WCIDDiameter/2. + WCBlackSheetThickness + (WCODRadius+WCODHeight)))/cos(dPhi/2.) ; // BQ: Updated with new HK OD size (2020/12/06)
176  //WCLength = WCIDHeight + 2*2.3*m; //jl145 - reflects top veto blueprint, cf. Farshid Feyzi
177  //WCRadius = (WCIDDiameter/2. + WCBlackSheetThickness + 1.5*m)/cos(dPhi/2.) ; // TODO: OD
178 
179  // now we know the extend of the detector and are able to tune the tolerance
180  G4GeometryManager::GetInstance()->SetWorldMaximumExtent(WCLength > WCRadius ? WCLength : WCRadius);
181  G4cout << "Computed tolerance = "
182  << G4GeometryTolerance::GetInstance()->GetSurfaceTolerance()/mm
183  << " mm" << G4endl;
184 
185  //Decide if adding Gd
186  water = "Water";
187  if (WCAddGd)
188  {
189  water = "Doped Water";
190  if(!G4Material::GetMaterial("Doped Water", false)) AddDopedWater();
191  }
192 
193  // Optionally place parts of the detector. Very useful for visualization and debugging
194  // geometry overlaps in detail.
195  placeBarrelPMTs = true;
196  placeCapPMTs = true;
197  placeBorderPMTs = true;
198

201  // Volumes
202  //-----------------------------------------------------
203  // The water barrel is placed in an tubs of air
204 
205  G4Tubs* solidWC = new G4Tubs("WC",
206  0.0*m,
207  WCRadius+2.*m,
208  .5*WCLength+4.2*m, //jl145 - per blueprint
209  0.*deg,
210  360.*deg);
211 
212  G4LogicalVolume* logicWC =
213  new G4LogicalVolume(solidWC,
214  G4Material::GetMaterial("Air"),
215  "WC",
216  0,0,0);
217

220  logicWC->SetVisAttributes(showColor);
221 
222  logicWC->SetVisAttributes(G4VisAttributes::Invisible); //amb79
223 
224  //-----------------------------------------------------
225  // everything else is contained in this water tubs
226  //-----------------------------------------------------
227  G4Tubs* solidWCBarrel = new G4Tubs("WCBarrel",
228  0.0*m,
229  WCRadius+1.*m, // add a bit of extra space
230  .5*WCLength, //jl145 - per blueprint
231  0.*deg,
232  360.*deg);
233 
234  // G4cout << " qqqqqqqqqqqqqqqqqqqq " << " WCRadius " << WCRadius << " WCBarrel radius " << WCRadius+1.*m << " half height " << .5*WCLength << G4endl;
235 
236  G4LogicalVolume* logicWCBarrel =
237  new G4LogicalVolume(solidWCBarrel,
238  G4Material::GetMaterial(water),
239  "WCBarrel",
240  0,0,0);
241

243  new G4PVPlacement(0,
244  G4ThreeVector(0.,0.,0.),
245  logicWCBarrel,
246  "WCBarrel",
247  logicWC,
248  false,
249  0,
250  checkOverlaps);
251 
252  if(isODConstructed) {
253  //-----------------------------------------------------
254  // Cylinder wall's tyvek
255  //-----------------------------------------------------

258  WCRadius,
259  WCRadius + WCODTyvekSheetThickness,
260  .5 * WCLength, //jl145 - per blueprint
261  0. * deg,
262  360. * deg);
263 
264  G4LogicalVolume *logicCaveTyvek =
265  new G4LogicalVolume(solidCaveTyvek,
266  G4Material::GetMaterial("Tyvek"),
267  "CaveTyvek",
268  0, 0, 0);
269 
270  //G4VPhysicalVolume *physiCaveTyvek =
271  new G4PVPlacement(0,
272  G4ThreeVector(0., 0., 0.),
273  logicCaveTyvek,
274  "CaveBarrelTyvek",
275  logicWCBarrel,
276  false,
277  checkOverlaps);

280  new G4LogicalSkinSurface("TyvekCaveBarrelSurface", logicCaveTyvek, OpWaterTySurface);
281

283  showTyvekCave->SetForceWireframe(true);// This line is used to give definition to the rings in OGLSX Visualizer
284  logicCaveTyvek->SetVisAttributes(showTyvekCave);
285  //logicCaveTyvek->SetVisAttributes(G4VisAttributes::Invisible); //amb79

1139  odTopCapZ, //position of the Z planes

1144  = new G4Polyhedra("WCODBotCapTyvek",
1145  barrelPhiOffset, // phi start
1146  totalAngle, //phi end
1147  WCBarrelRingNPhi, //NPhi-gon
1148  4, // 4 z-planes
1149  odBotCapZ, //position of the Z planes
1150  odCapRmin, // min radius at the z planes
1151  odCapRmax// max radius at the Z planes
1152  );
1153  } else {

1155  // to polyhedra. We have to unite both parts, because there are
1156  // PMTs that are on the border between both parts.

1166  );

1192  extraCapRmax// max radius at the Z planes
1193  );

1198  // fortunately there are no PMTs an the gap!
1199  1, //NPhi-gon
1200  4, // z-planes
1201  odBotCapZ, //position of the Z planes
1202  extraCapRmin, // min radius at the z planes
1203  extraCapRmax// max radius at the Z planes
1204  );

1336  G4double AreaCellOD = barrelODCellWidth * barrelODCellHeight;
1337  G4double AreaPMTOD = 3.1415*std::pow(WCPMTODRadius,2);
1338  G4double NPMTODCovered = (AreaRingOD/AreaPMTOD) * WCPMTODPercentCoverage/100.;
1339  G4double NPMTODByCellFull = NPMTODCovered/WCBarrelRingNPhi; // NPMT required par cell to achieve ODPercentOverage
1340  G4double NPMTODByCell = round(NPMTODCovered/WCBarrelRingNPhi); // NPMT required par cell to achieve ODPercentOverage

1342  // ------ DEBUG ------ //

1345  G4cout << "AreaCellOD : " << AreaCellOD/m2 << " (m2)" << G4endl;

1347  G4cout << "--> NbPMTODCovered : " << NPMTODCovered << G4endl;

1584 
1590 G4LogicalVolume* WCSimDetectorConstruction::ConstructCaps(G4bool flipz)
1591 {
1592  // z-orientation multiplier
1593  const G4int zflip = (flipz ? -1 : 1);
1594  // substrings for constructing chiral component names
1595  const G4String oristr = flipz ? "Top" : "Bot";
1596  const G4String capstr = oristr + G4String("Cap"); // "[Top|Bot]Cap"
1597  const G4String bbstr = G4String("Barrel") +
1598  oristr + G4String("Border"); // "Barrel[Top|Bot]Border"
1599 
1600  capAssemblyHeight = (WCIDHeight-mainAnnulusHeight)/2+1*mm+WCBlackSheetThickness;
1601 
1602  const G4String caname = capstr + G4String("Assembly"); // "[Top|Bot]CapAssembly"
1603  G4Tubs* solidCapAssembly = new G4Tubs(caname,
1604  0.0*m,
1605  outerAnnulusRadius/cos(dPhi/2.),
1606  capAssemblyHeight/2,
1607  0.*deg,
1608  360.*deg);
1609 
1610  G4LogicalVolume* logicCapAssembly =
1611  new G4LogicalVolume(solidCapAssembly,
1612  G4Material::GetMaterial(water),
1613  caname,
1614  0,0,0);
1615 
1616  G4VisAttributes* tmpVisAtt = new G4VisAttributes(G4VisAttributes::Invisible);
1617  tmpVisAtt->SetForceWireframe(true);// This line is used to give definition to the rings in OGLSX Visualizer
1618  logicCapAssembly->SetVisAttributes(tmpVisAtt);
1619 
1620  //----------------------------------------------------
1621  // extra rings for the top and bottom of the annulus
1622  //---------------------------------------------------
1623  G4double borderAnnulusZ[3] = {
1624  (-barrelCellHeight/2.-(WCIDRadius-innerAnnulusRadius))*zflip,
1625  -barrelCellHeight/2.*zflip,
1626  barrelCellHeight/2.*zflip};
1627  G4double borderAnnulusRmin[3] = { WCIDRadius, innerAnnulusRadius, innerAnnulusRadius};
1628  G4double borderAnnulusRmax[3] = {outerAnnulusRadius, outerAnnulusRadius,outerAnnulusRadius};
1629 
1630  if(std::abs(borderAnnulusZ[2] - borderAnnulusZ[0]) > capAssemblyHeight - WCBlackSheetThickness) {
1631  G4cerr << "IMPOSSIBLE GEOMETRY: capAssemblyHeight ("
1632  << capAssemblyHeight << ") too small to contain border ring ("
1633  << std::abs(borderAnnulusZ[2] - borderAnnulusZ[0])
1634  << ") and endcap blacksheet (" << WCBlackSheetThickness << ")"
1635  << G4endl;
1637  }
1638 
1639  const G4String bbrname = G4String("WC") +
1640  bbstr + G4String("Ring"); // "WCBarrel[Top|Bot]BorderRing"
1641  G4Polyhedra* solidWCBarrelBorderRing = new G4Polyhedra(bbrname,
1642  barrelPhiOffset, // phi start
1643  totalAngle,
1644  WCBarrelRingNPhi, //NPhi-gon
1645  3,
1646  borderAnnulusZ,
1647  borderAnnulusRmin,
1648  borderAnnulusRmax);
1649  G4LogicalVolume* logicWCBarrelBorderRing =
1650  new G4LogicalVolume(solidWCBarrelBorderRing,
1651  G4Material::GetMaterial(water),
1652  bbrname,
1653  0,0,0);
1654  //G4cout << *solidWCBarrelBorderRing << G4endl;

2576 // This function finds the factors of a number and aims to minimise the difference between multiplied factors. This will result in a more square-like distribution of PMTs per cell.
2577 // ToDo: Change the implementation to remove the recursion. It looks like it can run away.
2578 void FindNiceFactors(G4int NPMT, G4double factors[2]){
2579  bool found = false;
2580  int difference = 100000;
2581  for (int i = 2; i<= (int)(NPMT/2); i++){
2582  if (NPMT % i == 0){
2583  // Factors found
2584  found = true;
2585  double a = i;
2586  double b = NPMT/i;
2587  int d = abs(a - b);
2588  if (d < difference){difference = d; factors[0] = a; factors[1] = b;} // make the difference between multiplied factors as small as possible, for a square rather than rectangle shape.
2589  }
2590  }
2591  if (!found){FindNiceFactors(NPMT-1, factors);}
2592 }
2593 void ComputeWCODPMT(const G4int NPMT, G4long& NPMTHorizontal, G4long& NPMTVertical){
2594  switch (NPMT) {
2595  case 0:
2596  G4cout << "N PMTs for OD is equal 0, increase coverage" << G4endl;
2597  NPMTHorizontal = 1;
2598  NPMTVertical = 1;
2599  break;
2600  case 1:
2601  NPMTHorizontal = 1;
2602  NPMTVertical = 1;
2603  break;
2604  case 2:
2605  NPMTHorizontal = 1;
2606  NPMTVertical = 2;
2607  break;
2608  case 3:
2609  NPMTHorizontal = 2;
2610  NPMTVertical = 2;
2611  break;
2612  case 4:
2613  NPMTHorizontal = 2;
2614  NPMTVertical = 2;
2615  break;
2616  default:
2617  G4double factors[2] = {1, 1};
2618  FindNiceFactors(NPMT, factors);
2619  NPMTHorizontal = factors[1];
2620  NPMTVertical = factors[0];
2621 
2622  break;
2623  }
2624 }

2626 G4LogicalVolume* WCSimDetectorConstruction::ConstructCylinderNoReplica()
2627 {
2628  G4cout << "**** Building Cylindrical Detector without using replica ****" << G4endl;
2629  ReadGeometryTableFromFile();
2630 
2631  //-----------------------------------------------------
2632  // Positions
2633  //-----------------------------------------------------
2634 
2635  debugMode = false;
2636 
2637  WCPosition=0.;//Set the WC tube offset to zero
2638 
2639  WCIDRadius = WCIDDiameter/2.;
2640  // the number of regular cell in phi direction:
2641  WCBarrelRingNPhi = WCBarrelNumPMTHorizontal/WCPMTperCellHorizontal;
2642  // the part of one ring, that is covered by the regular cells:
2643  totalAngle = 2.0*pi*rad*WCBarrelRingNPhi*WCPMTperCellHorizontal/WCBarrelNumPMTHorizontal;
2644  // angle per regular cell:
2645  dPhi = totalAngle/ WCBarrelRingNPhi;
2646 
2647  if(rotateBarrelHalfTower)
2648  barrelPhiOffset = -dPhi/2; // For WCTE, the barrel is rotated by half a tower for correct alignment with endcaps
2649  else
2650  barrelPhiOffset = 0.;
2651 
2652  // it's height:
2653  barrelCellHeight = (WCIDHeight-2.*WCBarrelPMTOffset)/WCBarrelNRings;
2654  // the height of all regular cells together:
2655  mainAnnulusHeight = WCIDHeight -2.*WCBarrelPMTOffset -2.*barrelCellHeight;
2656 
2657  //TF: has to change for mPMT vessel:
2658 
2659  G4cout << WCIDRadius << ", " << WCPMTExposeHeight << ", " << mPMT_vessel_cyl_height << ", " << mPMT_vessel_radius << G4endl;
2660 #ifdef DEBUG
2661  G4cout << "HYBRID = " << hybrid << G4endl;
2662 #endif
2663 
2664  if(hybrid){
2665  if(mPMT_vessel_cyl_height + mPMT_vessel_radius < 1.*mm)
2666  innerAnnulusRadius = WCIDRadius - std::max(WCPMTExposeHeight,WCPMTExposeHeight2)-1.*mm;
2667  else
2668  innerAnnulusRadius = WCIDRadius - std::max(WCPMTExposeHeight,(mPMT_vessel_cyl_height + mPMT_vessel_radius)) -1.*mm;
2669  }
2670  else{
2671  if(mPMT_vessel_cyl_height + mPMT_vessel_radius < 1.*mm)
2672  innerAnnulusRadius = WCIDRadius - WCPMTExposeHeight -1.*mm;
2673  else
2674  innerAnnulusRadius = WCIDRadius - (mPMT_vessel_cyl_height + mPMT_vessel_radius) -1.*mm;
2675  }
2676  // shift innerAnnulusRadius and outerAnnulusRadius if PMT is placed behind blacksheet
2677  innerAnnulusRadius += pmt_blacksheet_offset;
2678 
2679  //TF: need to add a Polyhedra on the other side of the outerAnnulusRadius for the OD
2680  outerAnnulusRadius = WCIDRadius + WCBlackSheetThickness + 1.*mm + pmt_blacksheet_offset;//+ Stealstructure etc.
2681  if(isODConstructed){

4171 
4177 G4LogicalVolume* WCSimDetectorConstruction::ConstructCapsNoReplica(G4bool flipz)
4178 {
4179  // z-orientation multiplier
4180  const G4int zflip = (flipz ? -1 : 1);
4181  // substrings for constructing chiral component names
4182  const G4String oristr = flipz ? "Top" : "Bot";
4183  const G4String capstr = oristr + G4String("Cap"); // "[Top|Bot]Cap"
4184  const G4String bbstr = G4String("Barrel") +
4185  oristr + G4String("Border"); // "Barrel[Top|Bot]Border"
4186 
4187  capAssemblyHeight = (WCIDHeight-mainAnnulusHeight)/2+1*mm+WCBlackSheetThickness+pmt_blacksheet_offset;
4188 
4189  const G4String caname = capstr + G4String("Assembly"); // "[Top|Bot]CapAssembly"
4190  G4Tubs* solidCapAssembly = new G4Tubs(caname,
4191  0.0*m,
4192  // use the largest radius in cap region
4193  (outerAnnulusRadius+std::max(GetRadiusChange(-zflip*WCIDHeight/2),GetRadiusChange(-zflip*mainAnnulusHeight/2)))/cos(dPhi/2.),
4194  capAssemblyHeight/2,
4195  0.*deg,
4196  360.*deg);
4197 
4198  G4LogicalVolume* logicCapAssembly =
4199  new G4LogicalVolume(solidCapAssembly,
4200  G4Material::GetMaterial(water),
4201  caname,
4202  0,0,0);
4203 
4204  G4VisAttributes* tmpVisAtt = new G4VisAttributes(G4VisAttributes::Invisible);
4205  tmpVisAtt->SetForceWireframe(true);// This line is used to give definition to the rings in OGLSX Visualizer
4206  logicCapAssembly->SetVisAttributes(tmpVisAtt);
4207 
4208  //----------------------------------------------------
4209  // extra rings for the top and bottom of the annulus
4210  //---------------------------------------------------
4211  G4double borderAnnulusZ[3] = {(-barrelCellHeight/2.-(WCIDRadius-innerAnnulusRadius))*zflip,
4212  -barrelCellHeight/2.*zflip,
4213  barrelCellHeight/2.*zflip};
4214  // Get the radius at global z

4689  pmtname, // its name

5153  cds_z_offset += 2*(-capAssemblyHeight/2.+1*mm+WCBlackSheetThickness); // logicWCCap placement
5154  cds_z_offset += 132.25*mm + 145*mm + 45.9225*mm + pmt_blacksheet_offset; // ad-hoc value to place CDS close to endcap blacksheet but not overlapping
5155  G4ThreeVector posCDS = G4ThreeVector(0*m, 0*m,cds_z_offset);
5156 
5157  // make new shape a solid
5158  G4VSolid* solid_CDS = shape_CDS->GetSolid();
5159 
5160  G4LogicalVolume* CDS_logical = //logic name
5161  new G4LogicalVolume(solid_CDS, //solid name
5162  G4Material::GetMaterial("StainlessSteel"), //material
5163  "CDS"); //objects name
5164  // rotate if necessary
5165  G4RotationMatrix* CDS_rot = new G4RotationMatrix; // Rotates X and Z axes only
5166  CDS_rot->rotateX(270*deg);
5167  CDS_rot->rotateY(315*deg);
5168 
5169  new G4PVPlacement(CDS_rot, //rotation
5170  posCDS, //at position
5171  CDS_logical, //its logical volume
5172  "CDS", //its name
5173  logicCapAssembly, //its mother volume
5174  false, //no boolean operation
5175  0, //copy number
5176  checkOverlaps); //overlaps checking
5177  new G4LogicalSkinSurface("CDSSurface",CDS_logical,BSSkinSurface);
5178  }
5179 
5180  return logicCapAssembly;
5181 
5182 }
